price: Ni jedhan: “Sila namoota lamaaf amannaa? kan nu fakkaataniifi kan ummanni isaanii nuuf gabbartoota ta'an"
arabic: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَٰبِدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: faqālū anu'minu libasharayni mith'linā waqawmuhumā lanā ʿābidūna
